title: Another batch of 4.5s - 1 available - 9 sold so far
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Another batch of 4.5s - 1 available - 9 sold so far
posts.post_content:
Ten Mid grade VGEX+ examples, nine with Piedmont and Sweet Cap Backs and one Polar Bear are priced 
according to the following sliding scale.  Add $10 if the Polar Bear is included in your purchase

1 card - $127


Shipping included.  Prefer check or money order over PP.  Add 3% for regular PayPal.  Family and Friends not an offered alternative for this sale.
If you cannot pay PP fees, Astra-Zeneca may be able to help.



Ed Willets Bat BVG 4.5. AVAILABLE,  but willet sell???

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10233/willett-batting[/IMG]

I’ll take Poland 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
